Object Flight Path: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
divs: Sighting DetailsI was at a friends house going home when I see a car waiting for me. They open the door and tell me I better get into the car. Once in they give me drugs to smoke crystal meth. Quickly we arrive to the destination. I am further drugged with chemicals not found anywhere on the street. Black Ops chemicals. Then I am forced to sit on the ground and wait, what I was waiting for was an apppature in spacetime from which stepped out an alpha draconian. I wasn't standing next to it alone, A Tall blond looks like a perfect specimen for a human was there. We both touched the head of the creature. Then it disappeared. I was put to sleep and taken to my home. End of event.
Summary: I was abducted to a point near my house let go and then prepared fro the encounter
trends: There have been 97 other sightings in Miami
There were 2 other sightings in Miami on or around April 3rd 2010
